page.title: 06LIFE OF THE LOCALS
page.content: {Leisure:} The life in Golden Cross is not very exciting. People are living in a quiet environment. They spend most of their time at home. Sometimes they will do some shopping, visiting their friends and gardening etc. There are some activities going on in Chiddingly, however. They are arranged by the Chiddingly Parish Council, for both the young and the old. There are many activities for the scouts, e.g rockclimbing, canoeing, camping ,mountain walking, cycling and gliding etc. Ocassionally, the council will arrange some competitions for the scouts, e.g camping. At the beginning of each year, there will be an outing, e.g London Science Museum. Concerns are sometimes held in the Village Hall .
